Office of Management & Budget
Mission Statement
The mission of the Office of Management and Budget is to properly manage the County’s budget in accordance with state regulations and to ensure that the budget process and results demonstrate high accountability, integrity, and prudent expenditure of public funds.
Important Documents
For persons with disabilities, please contact Holly Smith for alternate versions.
EDA
2023-2024 EDA Budget Resolution
Tentative Budget
Nothing for now
Budget Presentation Book
24-25 Budget Presentation
Adopted Budget
2024-2025 Adopted Budget
2023-2024 Adopted Budget
2022-2023 Adopted Budget
2021-2022 Adopted Budget
2020-2021 Adopted Budget
2019-2020 Adopted Budget
2018-2019 Adopted Budget
2017-2018 Adopted Budget
2016-2017 Adopted Budget
2015-2016 Adopted Budget
County Wide Financial Statements
2022-2023 County Audit
2021-2022 County Audit
2020-2021 County Audit
2019-2020 County Audit
2018-2019 County Audit
2017-2018 County Audit
2016-2017 County Audit
2015-2016 County Audit
2014-2015 County Audit

Management & Budget Policies
